725666f-a.title: Queens: 82nd Road - Queens Boulevard
725666f-a.text:
82nd Road (foreground, not seen), just south of Queens Boulevard
(right, not seen), showing Peter Opper's Roadhouse. This house
wtanding in 1927, is on the south side of Eighty-second Ave., just
west of Queens Boulevard. The pond does not appear after 1915 on any
atlas.
1897.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
